PLEASE NOTE

This questionnaire is intended for persons who came to Saskatchewan before 1911, and most of the questions are about that early period, although in a few questions information for later years is asked for.

If you cannot answer a question, leave the space blank. We realise that any one person will not be able to answer all questions, so answer those that apply to you or experience and that you can remember, and leave the others.
